Ardamir}}: 150px]]'''''atalantë''''' is a [[Quenya]] word meaning "the downfallen", from the verb-root ''[[talat-]]''.

{{Pronounce: '''Atalantë''' was the name given to [[Númenor]] after its [[Downfall of Númenor
